comments:
Build ID: I20070608-1718

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a new empty C++ project
2. Add folder to project, select advanced
3. select rse and attach an rse folder
4. Add a new type of Makefile to the "Makefile" content types:
4a. Select Window->prefernces
 b. Select General->Content Types->Text->Makefile
 c. Add Make-rules (or other) to the list using the "Add..." button
4. attempt to open the new Makefile (e.g. Make-rules or other) type on the Remote System folder underneath the C++ project.

Reassigning to TargetManagement > RSE as Makefiles work fine if they have been linked in via Samba
RM/RSE provides files via the standard EFS interface. CDT needs to be fixed to support remote resources even on EFS - see also bug 177994. Reassigning to CDT.

Created an attachment (id=80398)
patch 

here is a patch which fixes this, it make some changes to API (non internal package).  If there are now objection I can check it in.
